content: Red Boy is one of the Yaoguai Kings you'll need to fight at the end of Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. This agile fighter will use flames and duplicates to try and overwhelm you during this heated altercation at the end of the chapter.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Red_Boy.md', within the main section titled 'Red Boy'.
The content is as follows:
Red Boy is one of the Yaoguai Kings you'll need to fight at the end of Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. This agile fighter will use flames and duplicates to try and overwhelm you during this heated altercation at the end of the chapter.
